system.description:
Deception: convincingly avoiding the truth and misleading other people. This skill covers sleight-of-hand and disguise as well.

Examples: throw Deception/SOC 10+ to lie your way past a corporate sentry while posing as a visiting executive. Throw Deception/INT opposed by Investigation/INT to lie during a police interrogation and not be found out. Throw Deception/END 12+ to fool a polygraph lie detector test. Throw Deception/DEX 10+ to palm a small item (can be opposed by Recon or Investigation).
system.shortdescr: Convincingly avoiding the truth and misleading other people
